SEARCH
Package Controller

Class CustomerReport

java.lang.Object
Controller.CustomerReport
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CustomerReport extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This is the customer report controller class. It lets the user to select a customer from the drop down box and shows the all appointments of that customer.
